message: Travis, that shows about how much research you have done. Please, explain the dozens of old newspaper records reporting 7, 8, 10, and 12 foot skeletons being found by mimers, farmers turning up their land, railroad workers clearing land, and construction crews digging new foundations? Or the MANY skulls that can be found in south America that range from 2-4x the size of the average human skull? Don't be fooled by the things the scientific community hides and shove under the rug in an attempt to protect their own theories and truths.

The history of slavery Joe, is very confusing, but there is no doubt that the traditional enemies in Africa took of advantage of one of the basic laws of capitalism, it's called demand. The demand for manual labor in the """"new"""" world that was being stolen from its rightful owners created this demand and created a huge market for slaves. It is very unlikely that without this demand there would have been much less abductions among Africans for that purpose. The primary criminals, and this is irrefutable, were the Christians with their need for cheap manual labor in America.

This is ridiculous...if you haven't realized it by now (doubtful with all the Portland weirdos). Frankly, part of me thinks you idiots deserve despair. But the better part of me knows better. I have made a plead with to be the media hero in this story to report the absolute truth. You all are being fed a pack of lies...including facts by omission. These people are far from terrorists...quite the contrary. Wake the hell up and learn the truth...instead of listenting to the lamestream media directed at your sympathies. Geez...I'm really tired of trying to get the message across...but here's the latest that includes FBI interteraction...in long detail. Bother to learn...or bury your head.
